flawed_nl_solution:
The weight stack weighed 10*30=<<10*30=3000>>3000 pounds
So the added weight made it 3000*0.2=<<3000*0.2=600.0>>600.0 pounds heavier
So when he lowered the weight it was 3000+600.0=<<3000+600.0=3600.0>>3600.0 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
